frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-volume-mixer
frozen.shortDescription: Applet allowing separate configuration of PulseAudio mixers.
frozen.longDescription:
Applet allowing separate configuration of PulseAudio mixers.

Shell Volume Mixer is an extension for GNOME Shell allowing separate configuration of PulseAudio devices and output switches. It features a profile switcher to quickly switch between pinned profiles and devices.

Middle mouse click on a slider mutes the selected stream.

Please file bugs and feature requests on the GitHub page.
